arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours today: Romain Esse to Crystal Palace, Woyo Coulibaly to Leicester, Philip Billing to Napoli
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Romain Esse to Crystal Palace, Woyo Coulibaly to Leicester City and Philip Billing to Napoli.

arts.ttl: Leicester beat QPR and fog to reach fourth round
arts.sum: Watch the highlights as Leicester City beat Championship side QPR 6-2 in a foggy encounter to reach the FA Cup fourth round.
How we rated the players. The post Leicester v QPR player ratings appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Done deal: 25-year-old “saying goodbye” to his club ahead of Leicester move
arts.sum: Leicester City are closing in on the capture of the Parma full-back Woyo Coulibaly. The 25-year-old has done quite well for the Italian outfit and his performances have attracted the attention of the Foxes. Leicester have reportedly agreed on a deal to sign the player and he is expected to join up with his new […] The post Done deal: 25-year-old “saying goodbye” to his club ahead of Leicester move appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy believes Leicester are improving after ending losing run
arts.sum: The Foxes had lost five in a row before the big win over QPR.

arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy gives update on first Leicester City transfer amid Woyo Coulibaly question
arts.sum: Leicester City boss Ruud van Nistelrooy kept his cards close to his chest regarding the club's January transfer business following reports the club were close to signing Parma's Woyo Coulibaly. "When deals are done, the players can be presented, then it's the time to talk about it." Asked if he was confident of City adding reinforcements, he replied: "We're working on different possibilities, in different positions.

Marti Cifuentes was annoyed by the costly mistakes QPR made in their 6-2 defeat at Leicester. Rangers caused the Premier League side problems but were punished for some awful defending and duly made the club’s now all-too familiar swift exit from the FA Cup. Head coach Cifuentes said: “The performance during many minutes was actually […] The post Cifuentes annoyed by QPR’s errors appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Leicester beat QPR and fog to reach fourth round
arts.sum: Watch the highlights as Leicester City beat Championship side QPR 6-2 in a foggy encounter to reach the FA Cup fourth round.

arts.ttl: Leicester City player ratings v QPR as trio stand out in emphatic victory
arts.sum: Two minutes later, Winks’ aimless ball into midfield was pounced upon, and a quick triangle of passes set up Jonathan Varane to rifle his first QPR goal into the bottom corner from 25 yards. All of the regulars played with James Justin at the double and with Stephy Mavididi, Facundo Buonanotte, Jamie Vardy also on the scoresheet before Wout Faes lashed a sublime sixth.

arts.ttl: Leicester run riot against QPR in thick fog at the King Power Stadium
arts.sum: The Foxes ended a five-match losing run in style.
